import React from 'react'; import { useMediaQuery } from "react-responsive"; import 'react-tabs/style/react-tabs.css'; import srcVacancies1 from "../../../../../images/landings/metinvest/vacancies/1.jpg"; import srcVacancies2 from "../../../../../images/landings/metinvest/vacancies/2.jpg"; import srcVacancies3 from "../../../../../images/landings/metinvest/vacancies/3.jpg"; import srcVacancies4 from "../../../../../images/landings/metinvest/vacancies/4.jpg"; import srcVacancies5 from "../../../../../images/landings/metinvest/vacancies/5.jpg"; import srcVacancies6 from "../../../../../images/landings/metinvest/vacancies/6.jpg"; import { Tab, Tabs, TabList, TabPanel } from 'react-tabs'; import { Element } from "react-scroll/modules"; import Slider from "react-slick/lib"; import ImageWork, { ImageWorkMobile } from "./ImageWork"; import CardVacancy from "./CardVacancy"; import MetinvestVacancies from "../../../../../configs/application/strings/landing/metinvest/Vacancies"; const BlockVacancies = () => { const isTabletOrMobileDevice = useMediaQuery( { maxDeviceWidth: 1224 } ); const settings = { dots: true, infinite: true, speed: 500, autoplay: true, autoplaySpeed: isTabletOrMobileDevice ? 4000 : 2500, slidesToShow: isTabletOrMobileDevice ? 1 : 3, slidesToScroll: 1, }; if (isTabletOrMobileDevice) return (
. ' Metinvest.
